articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Already strained supply chain at risk in ongoing port labor talks
articles.description: The current round of labor talks between management at the 29 ports up and down the coast, and the International Longshore and Warehouse Union has businesses that depend on the ports very, very worried.

articles.title: Mortgage rates are soaring. Here's what that means for home buyers - CNN Video
articles.description: This week's mortgage rate jump to nearly 6% makes homes even more expensive. But will soaring rates finally bring the housing market back to earth? CNN Business' Matt Egan joins 'Nightcap's' Jon Sarlin to break it all down.

articles.author: Nicole Goodkind, CNN Business
articles.title: The Federal Reserve passes the buck on inflation
articles.description: The mission of the Federal Reserve is to foster the stability of US monetary systems. It's the reason the central bank was created in 1913, and it's the reason it still exists today.

articles.title: Average US gas price dips below $5 a gallon
articles.description: US drivers got a slight — very slight — break on prices this weekend as the AAA average for a gallon of unleaded gas fell below the $5 mark.

articles.title: Why New Jersey and Oregon still don't let you pump your own gas
articles.description: Every state has lifted its ban on self-service gas. Except for New Jersey and Oregon.
